Environment.Name: Origin
Environment.Description: A moment ago you were just in bed floating above your mind, dreaming about how to add zebras to spreadsheets.  Now it appears you've awakened in a dimlit room. Many unfamiliar smells lurk around you.

Fields: After a few minutes of getting the key to fit correctly, the lock releases and the door creakily opens.

Map.Name: Origin
Map.Description: A moment ago you were just in bed floating above your mind, dreaming about how to add zebras to spreadsheets.  Now it appears you've awakened in a dimlit room. Many unfamiliar smells lurk around you.

Fields: After a few minutes of getting the key to fit correctly, the lock releases and the door creakily opens.

Map.Name: Long Hallway, South End
Map.Description: The door opens into what appears to be a really long hallway leading North. There's no light at the other end.

Exits.Description: Creaky Door, leading back where you came from

Map.Name: Long Hallway, North End
Map.Description: It gets so dark you have to feel your way around.

Exits.Description: The south end of the hallway
A door with no features, labeled 'Private'

Map.Name: Office
Map.Description: As the door opens, you begin to see the remnants of an old dusty office.  This place hasn't been used in years. An old typewriter on the desk is missing most of its keys.

Fields: As you press down hard on one of the keys. The air begins to move around you. Suddenly, a secret passage opens up from within the wall.

Map.Name: Secret Passage
Map.Description: As the door opens, you begin to see the remnants of an old dusty office.  This place hasn't been used in years.

Fields: A moment ago you were just in bed floating above your mind, dreaming about how to add zebras to spreadsheets.  Now it appears you've awakened in a dimlit room. Many unfamiliar smells lurk around you.
